pddf_dev_types.description: - Below is the list of supported PDDF device types (chip names) for various components. If any component uses some other driver, we will create the client using 'echo <dev-address> <dev-type> > <path>/new_device' method

attr_list.bmc_cmd: ipmitool fru print 0 | grep -e B2F -e F2B
ipmitool fru print 0 | grep -e B2F -e F2B
